reviews.text: Very very beautiful but we made a mistake of not doing enough research. U reach this place with a ferry and the ferry stops from 330 to 8pm due to low tide. We reached at 3pm, had to leave without food or even seeing the property properly

Stopped by at the restaurant after a visit to Querim beach. Magnificent view from the restaurant. Also requested the front desk to show us a room and she obliged. Beautiful , large rooms with sea view and nice decor.

A Unique Slice of Goan History and Luxury

Set along the northern shores of Goa, the Fort Tiracol Heritage Hotel is a one-of-a-kind destination that seamlessly blends centuries-old history with modern luxury. Nestled within the walls of a 450-year-old Portuguese fort, this property offers guests an immersive experience that transports them back in time while still providing all the comforts of a high-end resort.

Upon arrival, the sheer scale and grandeur of the fort are immediately awe-inspiring. The beautifully preserved structure, with its impressive ramparts and striking white facade, instantly sets the tone for an unforgettable stay. As you step through the entryway, the transition from the bustling outside world to the serene, almost meditative atmosphere of the hotel grounds is palpable.

The suites are uniquely designed, paying homage to the property's storied past while offering every contemporary amenity. Each of them is designed with Portuguese interiors and cutely named after the seven days of the week.  Spacious layouts, plush furnishings, and stunning views of the Tiracol River or the Arabian Sea create an undeniably regal ambiance. The attention to historical detail is remarkable, with elements like exposed stone walls and antique furniture pieces effortlessly complementing the modern comforts.

What truly sets Fort Tiracol apart, however, is its ability to transport guests to a bygone era while still providing all the luxuries of a modern resort. The seamless blend of historical ambiance and contemporary comforts creates an experience that is truly unparalleled, making it a must-visit destination for anyone seeking a unique and unforgettable stay in Goa.

LOCATION: Close to the Konkan coast of Maharashtra than Goa, it is located within easy reach from popular beaches of Goa like ARAMBOL, MAJORIM, QUERNEM, etc.

DINE + DRINK: The in-house lounge bar (called The TAVERN) is an ode to old Portuguese taverns and comes with lovely views of the Sea. There’s also an all-day café serving Goan, Indian, and European snacks and pastries right by the river

ROOM: We stayed in a Room called FRIDAY, so this review is based on that;  SIZE: Spacious enough for 2 adults and simple baggage; VIEW: Sweet view of the sea from the cute attached balcony; AIR-CON: Perfectly functioning cooler that helped in setting the perfect room temperature; BED: Comfortable bed that played the expected part of putting us to sleep; BATHROOM: Stand-in shower; TOILETRIES: Good quality toiletries by INARA brand

FACILITIES: No Gym or pool on site, pure Beachfront chill!

SERVICE: Friendly staff that took care of all our needs with a smile and made us feel pampered and well taken care of.

HOW WIRED YOU WILL BE: Free Wi-Fi that works well all over the property, and the speed is good! Big Smart TV dishing out a wide variety of channels spanning sports, news, music, movies, and  entertainment in multiple languages

We just visited the fort and were not staying there. It has been converted to a hotel, hence cannot be seen. The best part is the ferry ride, which is the only means to reach here. This ferry carries your car as well.

Fort Tiracol Hotel is an absolutely unique amazing experience. We stayed here few times and loved it. The rooms are beautifully decorated, very clean and stylish. If you’d like to stay in the only hotel in Goa that has this historical feeling, drink tea on the little balcony with the best view possible, surrounded by tranquil wild nature, listen the waves in the night, enjoying long relaxing breakfast watching the sea, this is definitely the place to go.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Hill Rock Goa
address: P. O Arambol Tiracol, Arambol, Goa 403524, India

reviews.text: Fresh and tasty fish and other sea foods. Lepe fish, squid and prawn are very delicious.  I liked it very much. There is also a variety of beverages.
Highly recommended. The seafood was great specially the open rawa fry prawns. We came all the way from Arambol for the sea food. Must visit place for seafood. Definitely coming back again.
Very good service, food quality and cooperative staff. The sea view is really great!! ⛵🌊

Let's just say it's a decent stop over if you're headed from North Goa into Maharashtra or vice versa, the food is okay-Ish, nothing great to write home about, the rooms are aged the door hinges may creek and squeal from time to time, the bed, the closets and furniture is outdated, for the price they charge you may get some smaller but better decent staying options in Arambol or nearby areas, what makes it popular that this hotel has an attached bar and restaurant and a wine shop all in a single file!
They have a huge courtyard that comes with a swimming pool with a wonderful view of the Terekhol river and the Arabian sea, the mornings and evenings are very pleasant.
Mind you there is no room service, you will have to walk to their restaurant cum bar, which is a stone’s throw away, and sadly this is the only eating joint and watering hole nearby.
They do serve you a complimentary breakfast along with some coffee or tea, both of which are forgettable at best.
I wouldn’t say that this is a place for families or couples per se, this place is mostly occupied by hordes of tourists who come in large groups, buy alcohol from the attached wine shop, get food from the restaurant themselves, occupy the tables in the courtyard, play loud music, revel, shout, bellow to their hearts content oblivious to the fact that there are other people around trying to get some shut eye. What’s worse is that that all the litter left behind is haphazardly gathered in the morning and what gets left behind is simply chuck over the fence into the valley below.
I had made a reservation for 3 nights but hightailed it back to Konkan after spending only one evening here, and I honestly do not see myself going back to this place.
But hey, if you’re in for a night full of revelry with a bunch of rowdy mates in an affordable accommodation with dirt cheap alcohol and edible food, then this could very well be your joint, by all means have at it!

Every visit to this amazing place the same, fantastic. Staff friendly and helpful, food, quick, reasonable and delicious 😋.
Visit at sunset for a great evening, recommended 👌

places_with_reviews.name: Mermaid Resort
address: Arambol, Corgao Road, near Kalawati Temple, Bhatwadi, Korgaon, Goa 403524, India

reviews.text: Mermaid resorts are very budget friendly and the rooms are so neat and clean ,as it was bit far to the city but very near to some beaches such as (arambol beach ,mandram beach,ashvem beach) we stayed for 4nights accomodation was so good and the staff was very helpful the main thing in the resort is food, such a homely and traditional food and the view from the resort pretty cool and there are another resort of mermaid the upgrade version need to stay there tooo ,finally this was the best stay in goa who needs peace with less crowded with full of greenery ❤️
It’s very good  place to stay , camel cafe food is delicious and it’s very close to sweet lake and mud bath. It’s very close to arambol beach.

Good ambition
Helpful staff
Best part of my trip is food
Delicious food 😋
Nice ac rooms, also food provided is home made

There was Voltage Fluctuations in first floor Room, AC and Fan was not working properly but hotel person shifted us to ground floor and it was good. Toilet would have been bit more cleaner. The wooden infra was good.

Wow !!! Amazing hotel!!!!

I am currently staying at Palm Paradise, completing a 200 Hour YTTC that is being held here, and it is Pardise.

I have  been coming to India many years, and this is most definitely the best place I have ever stayed.

The rooms are spacious, modern, and shower is always hot!!!! Which you don't often get in India, so a great plus for that alone.

The cleanliness can not be faulted. The pool area is very well cared for and lovely and relaxing to sit by.

The food is to die for!!! We get 3 very tasty, varied meals every day, with much choice . So many thanks to Chef Rupesh 🥲❤️

The staff are very lovely, they cannot do enough for you, especially Rajan, who always has a smile on his face. He makes my day with his smile when I see him in the morning. 😁

They have all made us feel like family. Our stay here is proving to be very special and feel blessed that we have another 2 and a half weeks here.

The location is very tranquil and peaceful with amazing views.  The beach is not far and there are restaurants and cafes in the area.

They have a beautiful yoga studio on the top floor. Everything about the hotel has been well thought out and just can't be faulted.

Thank you Palm Paradise, for making our stay so so special. We feel very  grateful to be here we will definitely be coming back
This was our first hotel stay during a 3 week trip in India and it was the perfect place to settle down and relax after spending a full day in transit. Highly recommended.
Nice & well maintained property but service is very poor, indians are kept on low priority...mostly you will find Russian guests here :D

The best place to stay in Qwerim! Peaceful hotel, afar from noise, with everything you need to rest: swimming pool, clean one,  clean rooms, new wooden furniture, conditioner, kettle,hairdrier. Very good restaurant inside. Room service as often as you need. Hot water all time.
12 min walk to the Qwerim beach, 5-10 min walk to  foodshops or cafe.

I must say, I was thoroughly impressed with my experience here. From start to finish, the staff were welcoming, accommodating, and attentive to my needs.

The room itself was immaculate and spacious, with modern decor and all the amenities I needed for a comfortable stay. The bed was especially comfortable, with a view of mesmerizing view of greenery from the balcony.

One of the highlights of my stay was the breakfast buffet, which offered an impressive spread of fresh, delicious options to suit every taste, whether you're a foreign tourist or Indian

Finally, I have to mention the location of the hotel. Away from the rush & chaos of cities like panajim.

The pool is clean, well-maintained, and surrounded by beautiful landscaping that creates a peaceful and inviting atmosphere.

Overall, I would highly recommend palm paradise resort to anyone looking for a top-notch hotel experience. The staff, amenities, and location all exceeded my expectations, and I look forward to returning in the future.

places_with_reviews.name: Dragonfly Goa
address: 224 Dragonfly, next to Ganpat Parsekar College, Arambol, Goa 403524, India

reviews.text: We booked a private room for a group of 4 friends through AirBnb. On arriving at the God for saken remote place through cab which cost Rs. 2000 and 1.5 hours drive- they offered dormitory instead of private rooms, we agreed, later on seeing our booking through AirBnB they asked for extra money, worst experience they do these booking through AirBnB and then ask for extra money. I have communicated before arriving, think twice before booking through AirBnB because AirBnB also doesn't issue refund without calling the host and the host won't pick up the phone purportedly. And I was stuck without a roof above the head. It charges Rs. 800 for dormitory bedding with one bedding stacked above the other in a small room, a small waiting area & yoga place and a cafe & a shop selling hand made soaps, a overcrowded pool. Not at all worth considering the remoteness of the place. Moreover the behavior & the dealings of the host also matters. (Ultimately I got the refund from AirBnB after a lot of struggle)

Amazing beautiful place with good caffe and music❤️💚🧡
Stay is good, with amazing people around

Dragonfly completely changed my stay in Goa.  First, when we arrived  there we were amazed at the beauty of the place , and soon when we met people who were living and working there... we stayed almost 3 months, I think that speaks a lot. In that time, there was amazing vegan restorant Body Green,  and now there is one very popular bar, Garden of Dreams. People who were staying there were totally open minded, creative and in the whole house is huge prodactive/creative energy, which is inspiring. After that amazing experience  there, I feel like I  have a new family. I will recommend everyone this place= it is a heart-opening place to be. Thank you, guys, for everything see you !! Please come to Croatia, I would be happy to be your host (: love you all!!

I stayed here for 3 weeks.
During my stay there were many yoga classes, workshops, concerts, even a festival!
Bodhi Green’s food is amazing!
Wifi connection is good.
It’s an amazing place to do workcation.

I was attending Shiva yoga in Dragonfly (each day 9:30 morning) and this is amazing experience. International Community of nice people, you can find friends. Also yoga by Shiva was one of my best experiences, all your body is working! After yoga there is Shavasana with sound healing 😍 you can find Shivayoga.Goa in Instagram.

Also the place of dragonfly is amazing, so calm, clean and shanti. I loved the pool and yoga space

places_with_reviews.name: Arambol Paradise Village Resort with Swimming Pool

reviews.text: A perfect spot for short staycation. The location is situated 3kms away from arambol beach. 2 typs of rooms available. ac dulux and wooden cottages. Dulux rooms are spacious whereas wooden cottages are comparatively smaller. Swimming pool water is very clean. Also a special mention and shoutout to the cook/caretaker viru. He can cook delicious food. Highly recommended. And for dog lovers there is this beautiful girl rosy who will be your companion through the whole stay.

One of the worst experience they deserve 0 star caretaker and owner that not care any thing 0 customer service.

Note care taker found drunk.

you cannot drink after 10 pm
One of the best resorts I've been to, The rates are reasonable and services are good, recommended to stay. Bonus tip : It's located around calm and peaceful surroundings.
Nice and affordable rooms
Amazing rooms Amazing pool clean

places_with_reviews.name: Dhanashree Riverview Hotel
address: Konadi, Korgaon, Pernam Municipal Area, Goa 403512, India

reviews.text: Good place to stay near airport. Its a small town and close to river. It takes exact 30 min from here to reach at airport. Good place if you dont wanna be in to city before your flight... You will not face any traffic on the way to airport...

Very far from all basic necessity. Its in total jungle.
No hot water.
Unhygienic place with mosquito's.
Owner only interested in his money. Less co-operation from owner.
Before booking please visit and check the place.

I Stayed At this property for 2 days and it was a truly refreshing experience. The staff is immensely hospitable and makes you feel at home. The ambience is soothing and every section of the hotel screams luxury. The Location is great as it is extremely close to Manohar international airport Mopa  Goa and offers great view of the river . will definitely recommend !!

Very bad experience.

Family of 3, me/wife and 7 yr old kid.
Checked in at 2230 and supposed checkout was at 0400 AM to catch a flight at the Manohar international airport.

I paid 1568 for an "AC" room.

Due to rains there was a power cut and the inverter only supports a light in the room. It doesn't support the FAN.

Since it was raining outside and the windows had no mesh, we did not open windows due to mosquitos and other insects coming into the room.

It got claustrophobic and suffocating. Ultimately we left for the airport around 0130 deciding that the airport is going to be a lot better than this.

I will not be choosing this place again.
Best hotel near manohar international airport mopa goa

places_with_reviews.name: Rajgad Resort
address: near Heera Jal Factory, Malewad, Maharashtra 416510, India

reviews.text: Rooms are very spacious which are super clean as well. Good place for families to stay. Room service is above average, fish curry was fabulous. Since we were the only family in resort it was a bit scary experience for us at night. Good numbers of security guards may solve this problem. But overall we had an amazing stay, best part is that it’s very close to our Kuldevata Shri Vetoba temple in Ajagaon.

Overall experience was good. Staff is little bit rude. It is good for arranging functions, I attended engagement ceremony of one of my friends. You won't get any extra-ordinary views from this resort.

1. Location:- It is convenient to connect to shiroda beach and goa both are 6 km away from this report(I feel this is an excellent place to chill and enjoy your holiday)
2.Food :- Excellent taste especially fish food
3.Cleanliness :- It is highly maintained (corridor and resort as well)
4.Staff :- Very polite and friendly also with quick service
They have clean swimming pool you can enjoy whole day, In night you can enjoy your food under stars and it is surrounded by nature
If you think this is far from beaches and goa but i would suggest it is better than the hotels available at the beaches
Great resort Everything is there lot of parking space plus swiming pool and restaurant .Hall is there for Marriages and other functions.Overall good and Staff is also well behaved.
Quite place for Family and Friends to spend time. Neat and clean swimming pool, good Indian and Malvani food served. Spacious family rooms. Staff is nice. Overall a good experience for me.

places_with_reviews.name: EISRA Wellness Resort
address: PP75+F8V, Unnamed Road, Querim, Goa 403524, India

reviews.text: Very good for a digital detox. Beautiful surroundings and very comfy. Great place to have a work-cation.
Nice cottages made of wooden. Such a pleasant place to relax.
Very peaceful and awesome place for stay I recommend to all
Wonderful Place to relax with nature
Best Resort in Goa

places_with_reviews.name: Shiva Home Stays
address: near Sannas Centre, Querim, Goa 403524, India

reviews.text:
I stayed in one of the rooms for over a month. It's very quiet, the bed is very comfortable, and there's a large refrigerator. Everything is available nearby, within walking distance (beach, supermarket, restaurants, etc.). The owners have always been there to help.
Good luck with everything, see you next time 👍

Amazing Place to stay Near The Beach.
Rooms are nice and well maintained.
Also Provides a kitchen in our room so you can cook your food also.
Toilets are clean. Whole property is nice. There ia also a terrace.
My experience in this property has been very nice.
Recommend this property to everyone.

The room was clean, the owner is a very generous and honest helper, a room with AC and a refrigerator is a very practical and refreshing thing in Goa, excellent location close to the sea and a cute cafe, I recommend you enjoy

What a pleasant stay. Perfect location. The rooms are very clean. Silent surroundings. Owner Mr. Sanjay Kaskar will treat you like a family. He will provide you each and every information so that your stay will be perfect. Will look forward to going there again.

Nice place. Peaceful and tranquil. Approx. 5 mins walking distance to the kerim beach... All amenities available... Budget property. Good for long stay as well... …More
